  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205358</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Art of Improvisation: Rova Saxophone Quartet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die kunst der Improvisation: Rova Saxophone
Quartett</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'art de l'improvisation : Quartet de 
Saxophone de Rova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A arte do improvisation: Quartet De Rova 
Saxophone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte di improvvisazione: Quartetto Di Rova
Saxophone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η τέχνη του αυτοσχεδιασμού: Κουαρτέτο 
Saxophone Rova</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El arte de la improvisación: Cuarteto De 
Rova Saxophone</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK gets an insider's look at the Rova Saxophone Quartet, a vanguard musical group that has improvised its way along the cutting edge of the music and sound art scene for 25 years. This Educator Guide explores improvisation in music, jazz and free jazz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN erhält den Blick eines Eingeweihten am 
Rova Saxophone Quartett, eine musikalische Gruppe der Avantgarde, 
die seine Methode entlang der Schneide der Musik- und Tonkunstszene 
für 25 Jahre improvisiert hat. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung 
erforscht Improvisation in der Musik, im Jazz und im freien Jazz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE en a le regard d'un initié après le
quartet de Saxophone de Rova, un groupe musical de tête 
d'avant-garde qui a improvisé sa voie le long du tranchant de la 
scène d'art de musique et de bruit pendant 25 années. Ce guide
d'éducateur explore l'improvisation dans la musique, le jazz et le 
jazz libre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA começa o olhar de um insider no quartet
de Rova Saxophone, um grupo musical do vanguard que improvise sua 
maneira ao longo da borda de corte da cena da arte da música e do som
por 25 anos. Esta guia do educador explora o improvisation na 
música, no jazz e no jazz livre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA ottiene lo sguardo del membro al 
Quartetto di Rova Saxophone, un gruppo musicale di avanguardia che 
ha improvvisato il relativo modo lungo il filo di lama della scena di 
arte del suono e di musica per 25 anni. Questa guida 
dell'educatore esplora l'improvvisazione nella musica, nel jazz e nel 
jazz libero.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ παίρνει ενός μέλους εξετάζει το 
Κουαρτέτο Rova Saxophone, μια μουσική ομάδα 
εμπροσθοφυλακής που έχει αυτοσχεδιάσει τον τρόπο της κατά μήκος 
της τέμνουσας άκρης της μουσικής και της υγιούς σκηνής τέχνης 
για 25 έτη. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά τον 
αυτοσχεδιασμό στη μουσική, την τζαζ και την ελεύθερη τζαζ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA consigue la mirada de un iniciado en el 
Cuarteto de Rova Saxophone, grupo musical de la vanguardia que ha 
improvisado su manera a lo largo del filo de la escena del arte de la 
música y del sonido por 25 años. Esta guía del educador 
explora la improvisación en música, jazz y jazz libre.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
